import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { User, Bell, Shield, Palette, Save, CheckCircle, AlertCircle } from 'lucide-react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Settings: React.FC = () => { const { token } = useAuth(); const [settings, setSettings] = useState({ profile: { fullName: 'John Doe', email: 'john.doe@example.com', restaurantName: 'The Grand Bistro' }, notifications: { emailNotifications: true, pushNotifications: false }, appearance: { darkMode: true, autoSave: true } }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [saveMessage, setSaveMessage] = useState<{ type: 'success' | 'error'; message: string } | null>(null); const handleSettingChange = (key: string, value: boolean) => { setSettings(prev => ({ ...prev, [key]: value })); }; return (

); }; export default Settings;
